body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations              Multimedia Presentations                         The Changing Face of Tumacácori From the earliest sketch in 1849 to today, Tumacácori has undergone extensive transformation.  Watch the walls crumble and then build back up with the efforts of the National Park Service preservation team.  Duration:1 minute, 32 seconds               Alternatively, you can access these images by downloading the: Changing Face of Tumacácori Powerpoint (.ppt, 32M) Changing Face of Tumacácori PDF (.pdf, 9M)  or get high-resolution versions in the Photo Gallery below.                   Changing Face of Tumacácori   24 Photos  Watch the church of Tumacácori change over time, through natural forces and then by vigilance of preservation and restoration.                        Tumacácori's Facade High-resolution photography of the mission church facade in 2015 yielded some spectacular images! Put together this puzzle to see surface features of the church that are too high up to see with the naked eye. Church facade tiles - full resolution (.pdf, 29Mb) Church facade tiles - letter-sized pages (.pdf, 5.8Mb)
title: Tumacácori National Historical Park: Multimedia Presentations
